pageContent: Background: Enrollment of minorities in clinical trials remains low. Through a California population-based study of men with early stage prostate cancer, we examined the relationships between race/ethnicity and 1) attitudes, 2) knowledge and 3) willingness to participate in clinical trials.

metaData.source:
Reference man for radiological protection: 71 chemical elements' content of the prostate gland (normal and cancerous)
